title: GA5 Question 8 Clarification
text: You must use `gpt‑3.5‑turbo‑0125`, even if the AI proxy only supports `gpt‑4o‑mini`. Use the OpenAI API directly for this question.

title: Clarification on tokenizer
text: Just use a tokenizer to get the number of tokens and multiply that by the given rate.

title: Tools in Data Science Collaboration
text: We covered tools like Git, Python, Jupyter, Pandas, and Bash scripting in the course content and lectures from Jan 2025.
